title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body: I'm fairly sure there was a recent maintenance or some downtime not too long ago, as I remember seeing the notification in the client. But the service status now is showing all green, but the same issue as last week came up. Unable to connect to the login queue. Last time, there were a flood of threads and posts about it, but seeing as there is no current thread about it, I figured I'd post it up. I already tried all the fixes last time, and the only thing that worked was... to walk away for a couple hours, and come back. So. I think i'll just do that again.

replies.body: Thanks for the post, Kokua!  I appreciate the update, and glad to see that everything is okay now!
Update: able to log on now
same problem here....i cannot log in as well even when server is up.
